words.title: From Freelance Filmmaker to Web Developer
words.text: Hi everyone, I’ve been holding something in for a while now, and I feel like it’s time to share it with you all. I wanted to share the journey I’ve started to embark on and the reasons behind it. So here it goes!

words.title: No more cards
words.text: Hey everyone, I just wanted to give you all a quick update and be transparent about where things stand right now. At the moment, I don’t have any new articles to share, but I truly appreciate your support and interest. More to come soon!
